ValidationRule.description: Date of Treatment 3 or Month of Treatment 3 must be entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Date_Treated_3__c ), ISBLANK( Treatment_3_MM_YYYY_If_No_Exact_Date__c ), Not( ISBLANK( Physician_Name_3__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Short_Term_Disability" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CL-034 Either Date Treated #3 or Treatment#3 MM/YYYY must be entered
